game.name: Gladiator Simulator
game.description:
Have you heard about the Gladiators? If not, here you have got a wonderful opportunity with us to learn about the conspicuous bravery/gallantry of these courageous souls. The word “Gladiator” has been taken from the popular word gladius that also has a meaning of short sword. These people generally fought a plenty of dangerous battles in the ancient Rome.  Today we have come to you Gladiator Simulator where you get a chance to play with different types of weapons and feel their bravery in your own style. 

The best part is they already know how to get the best out of the sword. All you need to do is just guide your character to claim for the victory over their dangerous opponents. Select from different types of weapons like a sword with a shield, a short sword, a two-handed sword and many more. Here your favorite Gladiator does not fight for the glory, but with an intention to please their audiences. Join this unique battlefield and get ready to help him to fight until his last breath in this one of the best action games. 

There are 5 types of weapons at your disposal, 2 awesome arena maps and a real gladiator simulator. It will be amazing to assist your character to make his way while fighting in the ancient gladiator battles in this exclusively designed 3D simulation game. Collect your weapon, enter the battle ground and be prepare to fight like a pro fighter in this cool html5 fighting game. With easy controls and seamless gameplay, it will be sufficient enough to keep you engrossed for hours. Good luck to win and prove your true fighting skills. Play 3D action packed game online for free without download.

game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D ALL ARROWS -MOVE,L CLICK-ATTACK,R CLICK- BLOCK, L SHIFT-RUN FACT,,X-CANCEL TRIGGER,DROP WEAPON,CANCEL LEDGE,,C- CROUCH,Q-JUMP,SPACE- DIVE ROLL,1-9 TO WEAPONS,X - DROP UNWIELDED WEAPONS,TAB-PAUSE
